channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous in 'A Dog For Dora', then in 'Super Pozole', today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: 5.4.3.2.1. It's fairy o'clock - and the start of a fantastic festival, featuring rides, games, cotton candy and a new friend with a flower contest dream.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig are taking Peppa and George to a festival - a jigsaw festival! Peppa is amazed by all of the completed jigsaws around the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is making a wicker basket. She explains it is a hobby - something you do to relax. The children discuss hobbies and learn about each other's favourite things to do.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Granny Pig's house. They find Mummy's old patchwork quilt that Granny made for her as a baby. Peppa decides she'd like to make one for the baby.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is out with Suzy and Granny Sheep. They come across an old van that Miss Rabbit is recycling. Granny Sheep decides she would like to turn it into an art van.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie and her new powers in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen', then in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups', Nano gets the hiccups and duplicates.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta has super powers in 'Pups Save a Giant Chicken', then in 'Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze', Harold Humdinger puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so that he can become mayor.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The bunnies discover a haunted house in 'Ghosts!', and then in 'The Gobbler!', the team goes undercover at a Gala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Lydia meets Daisy's imaginary friend in 'Pretend Friend', then in 'Croc Outta Water', Mr. Crocodile fish sits for Martin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We find out who can scare Storm in 'Scary Stories', then in 'The Smurf Who Lost His Shadow', Hefty's shadow wants to be free, but once they're separated, they're both in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Wally the Walrus searches for Cap'n Turbot in 'Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus', then in 'Pups Save the Hummy Gummies', Mayor Humdinger is jealous of Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill gets zapped back to the stone-age, and Nanny Plum turns everyone into frogs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA

channel.desc: Peppa and George have come to play at Granny and Grandpa's house. Everyone dresses as dinosaurs having lots of fun and a bit of a party.

channel.desc: Pedro loves superheroes. He has a superhero-themed party and Super Potato is one of the guests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are spending a day helping Dr Hamster the Vet. They meet so many pets and have such fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Playgroup has a garden outside. The children are all having fun growing different plants and playing hide and seek in the wild wood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit takes the children for swimming lessons in the little children's pool. At the end of the lesson, giant inflatables are brought out including an inflatable slide.

channel.desc: Peppa and George wake up in Granny and Grandpa's tent by the sea. Peppa finds a message in a bottle with a telephone number on it. Who is it from.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.

channel.desc: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes silly pictures, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa decides to walk up the big hill during their family hike in the countryside, Daddy Pig assures her that the hard climb will be worth it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim and Kai try to photograph the elusive SpaceBug.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Rowan and his energetic Dalmatian, Shadow, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Together, they take on a playful mission to recover all the balls that have been tipped out of the basket.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The new veterinarian Dr. Diwa visits town in 'The Crew Builds a Vet Clinic', and then in 'The Crew Builds a Mermaid Party', The pups save Lily's birthday party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze is competing in the ultimate trash-themed race, but Crusher is racing too, and he'll do anything to crush the competition. Who will come out on top.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Fuzzleglove gets carried away trying to make an evil sidekick in 'Fuzzbot!', then in 'Top Secret Notebook!', Derek accidentally returns Annabelle's secret notebook to the Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to be at two parties at once.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: It's the Roar festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a birthday surprise in 'Dora's Birthday Surprise', then in 'Moonlight Fiesta', Dora helps La Luna save the Moonlight Fiesta.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When things start to mysteriously disappear around the dollhouse, Gabby and Pandy play detectives.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Carnival has come to town and it's a chance to see all sorts of exciting people and floats.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and her friends historical re-enactment society are being cave people. Peppa and George join in helping to catch Grandpa Pig who is dressed as a mammoth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is back to Granny Pig's historical re-enactment society for a space adventure, as Peppa and George re-enact the Apollo moon landing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig joins with the other mummies to practise fighting fires at the fire station. The fire brigade demonstrate their practice using their motto.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle leaves the class with Mr Bull while she goes to the dentist. But the children already know the subjects Mr Bull suggests teaching.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig is baking an apple pie, so Daddy Pig suggests Peppa and George play a game of looking for things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle introduces the playgroup to the wonderful world of poetry - and the wonderful world of wooly socks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George learn some wonderful magic words. Nice things happen when you say please and thank you.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Labrador is here in his new ice cream van. It is his first day selling ice creams. In fact, Mr Labrador loves ice cream - perhaps a little too much.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gerald Giraffe is new to playgroup! He's trying to make friends with Peppa and the group, but finds being so tall is making playing hide and seek quite a challenge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping off, but that's not the last trip of the day for her.

channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: We find out how it all started in 'Super Duper Bunnies!', then in 'Ye Olde Sourbreath!', the evil Lord Sourman and his dragon go on a rampage, so the bunnies must dish out sweet justice.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's moustache is lost in 'Pups Save The Moustache', then in 'Pups Save the Funhouse', a carnival train gets stuck and results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

channel.desc: The new veterinarian Dr. Diwa visits town in 'The Crew Builds a Vet Clinic', and then in 'The Crew Builds a Mermaid Party', The pups save Lily's birthday party.

channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous in 'A Dog For Dora', then in 'Super Pozole', today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's the day of Mrs Cow and Mr Bull's wedding! Not everything goes to plan, but that doesn't stop it being the best wedding ever, and there is a lot of happy crying.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team.

channel.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier.

channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom.

channel.desc: Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel needs someone to watch over the Smurfs he's captured in 'Lucretia Seizes Power', then in 'Papa Smurf Lost His Mind', Papa Smurf loses his memory and starts acting like a child.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups save Humdinger from falling space debris in 'Pups Stop the Falling Space Jun', then in 'Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo', Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Eddie and Emmy cause trouble in 'Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch', and then in 'Pups Save a Lonely Ghost', Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and tries to help it to make new friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help the Mayor go skydiving in 'The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Centre', then in 'The Crew Builds A Roller Rink', Wheeler and Truffles try some new wheels.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a slime swamp, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become Knights and rescue them before it's too late.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: On a hectic shipping day, Nia volunteers to deliver a missed shipment , but soon finds herself embarrassed to admit that the delivery has been anything but.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Lydia meets Daisy's imaginary friend in 'Pretend Friend', then in 'Croc Outta Water', Mr. Crocodile fish sits for Martin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train in 'Pups Save the Chicken Conductor', then in 'Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists', Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: While saving Travis, the pups find something else in 'Pups Save the Elephant Spa', then in 'Pups Save an Underwater Otis', Otis gets trapped in a sunken container.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: When Tommy enters his first Rocket Race, Tim does all he can to support his brother.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Kaiden and his Siberian Husky, Luca, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To rescue two alpacas stranded in the garden's snowy zones.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew help Hadley's hotel guests in 'The Crew Builds a Hotel Elevator', then in 'The Crew Builds a Popcorn-Cat Cafe', Cafe Carl has a case of kitten chaos.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The bunnies discover a haunted house in 'Ghosts!', and then in 'The Gobbler!', the team goes undercover at a Gala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Wandy gets a cold and is taken ill, Holly is given a replacement wand. This new wand can do lots of things that Wandy can't, and soon becomes the favourite.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: More friendly adventures in Gabby's Dollhouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her play group are visiting the museum. But not just any museum - it's the Science Museum, where there are lots of buttons to push and things to try out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is Mandy Mouse's birthday, and as a special treat, Mandy is going to Cheese World with her friends. It is the most fun ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is a lovely, sunny day. Peppa and George have come to the seaside. It's a perfect time for everyone to make sandcastles, with a moat, a bridge, and a visitor.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig takes Peppa to the doctors for her yearly health check up with Dr Polar Bear, who checks her height, weight, ears, mouth and heartbeat and more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.[(96057)]
